de.linearbits.swt.table

Class DynamicColumnData

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.linearbits.swt.table.DynamicColumnData

  • public class DynamicColumnData
extends java.lang.Object
    DynamicColumnData

    Sets the dynamic properties of a column.

    The objects of this class must be registered and handled by an instance of DynamicColumnManager

    See Also:
    org.mihalis.opal.dynamictablecolumns.DynamicTableColumnLayout

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicColumnData

        public DynamicColumnData(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableColumn tableColumn,
                 java.lang.String preferredLength)

        Create a dynamic column definition in order to specify steps required for a TableColumn.

        !Builder alternative avoids setting minimum length, using default 0px !

        Definition of length
        The lengths are specified using a String, containing quantity, followed by an identifier of measurement.
        Ex.: "355px", "100%"

        Parameters:
        tableColumn - TableColumn The column (a table) that should be controlled length.
        preferredLength - String That defines or desired length as column.
        See Also:
        TableColumn

      • DynamicColumnData

        public DynamicColumnData(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableColumn tableColumn,
                 java.lang.String preferredLength,
                 java.lang.String minLength)

        Create a dynamic column definition in order to specify the measures required for a TableColumn.

        Definition of length
        The lengths are specified using a String, containing the number, followed by an identifier of measurement.
        Ex.: "355px", "100%"

        Parameters:
        tableColumn - TableColumn The column (a table) that should be controlled length.
        preferredLength - String That defines or desired length as column.
        minLength - String That defines or minimum length as column.
        See Also:
        TableColumn

      • DynamicColumnData

        public DynamicColumnData(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeColumn treeColumn,
                 java.lang.String preferredLength)

        Create a dynamic column definition in order to specify steps required for a TreeColumn.

        !Builder alternative avoids setting minimum length, using as standard 0px !

        Definition of length
        The lengths are specified using a String, containing quantity, followed by an identifier of measurement.
        Ex.: "355px", "100%"

        Parameters:
        treeColumn - TreeColumn Column (a tree) you want to control the length.
        preferredLength - String That defines or desired length as column.
        See Also:
        TreeColumn

      • DynamicColumnData

        public DynamicColumnData(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeColumn treeColumn,
                 java.lang.String preferredLength,
                 java.lang.String minLength)

        Create a dynamic column definition in order to specify steps required for a TreeColumn.

        Definition of length
        The lengths are specified using a String, containing quantity, followed by an identifier of measurement.
        Ex.: "355px", "100%"

        Parameters:
        treeColumn - TreeColumn Column (a tree) you want to control the length.
        preferredLength - String That defines or desired length as column.
        minLength - String That defines or minimum length as column.
        See Also:
        TreeColumn
